content:
Sure! Here are some recommendations to get started:

1) "Not as Good as the Book" (2008) - This is a concept album that explores the history of progressive rock, with nods to Pink Floyd, Yes, and Genesis.

2) "Le Sacre du Travail" (2013) - This album is inspired by Stravinsky's "The Rite of Spring" and explores themes of work and labor.

3) "A Spark in the Aether" (2015) - This album showcases the band's ability to incorporate jazz and fusion elements into their sound.

4) "Proxy" (2018) - This album features the return of original members Andy Tillison and Jonas Reingold and explores themes of politics and social issues.

5) "Auto Reconnaissance" (2020) - This album takes a more personal approach to songwriting and deals with topics such as grief, loss, and self-discovery.

Hope you enjoy listening to them!
